short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easiest way to find user ID on Facebook

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Just install then reload Facebook Tab
You can find the User's Facebook ID on the user's profile or hover card.
Copy it with just one click

Enjoy it. Don't forget comeback here and rate 5* if you like it üòç
